old_text:
4.1 General requirements
The organization shall establish, document, implement and maintain a quality management system and maintain
its effectiveness in accordance with the requirements of this International Standard.
change_text:
Deleted requirement: 4.1 General requirements
The organization shall establish, document, implement and maintain a quality management system and maintain
its effectiveness in accordance with the requirements of this International Standard....

old_text:
7.3.1 Design and development planning
The organization shall plan and control the design and development of the product.
change_text:
Deleted requirement: 7.3.1 Design and development planning
The organization shall plan and control the design and development of the product....

old_text:
7.3.2 Design and development inputs
Inputs relating to product requirements shall be determined and records maintained.
8. Measurement, analysis and improvement
change_text:
Deleted requirement: 7.3.2 Design and development inputs

8. Measurement, analysis and improvement...

old_text:
8.1 General
The organization shall plan and implement the monitoring, measurement, analysis and improvement processes
needed.

Deleted requirement: 8.1 General
The organization shall plan and implement the monitoring, measurement, analysis and improvement processes
needed....

old_text:
8.2.1 Customer satisfaction
As one of the measurements of the performance of the quality management system, the organization shall
monitor information relating to customer perception.
